Articles.Content:
Here for all to see, trains in KSP!

The Grand Attraction!

![ueb3SAu.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/ueb3SAu.png?1)

The Bigboy

This giant monster of a rover is the longest steam locomotive in the world. In testing with payloads as train cars are in development

![Cs0yc5Z.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/Cs0yc5Z.png?1)

[915 Ãƒâ€” 480 - steamlocomotive.com](https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=http://www.steamlocomotive.com/bigboy/4019b.jpg&imgrefurl=http://www.steamlocomotive.com/bigboy/?page%3Dup&h=480&w=915&tbnid=v5matuk86G0lfM:&docid=sK2-L7U7Xu_kVM&ei=KuLLVcW1GoW4ggTBi4CAAg&tbm=isch&client=safari&ved=0CDQQMygCMAJqFQoTCMXyj57kpMcCFQWcgAodwQUAIA)

The next locomotive is the LB&SCR E2 class.

AKA The Thomas class!

![2u8pmbY.png](http://i.imgur.com/2u8pmbY.png)

This speedy little shunter is designed to shunt heavy loads. This engine will be the first to come to my station point I landed earlier today.

![BQlBfN7.png](http://i.imgur.com/BQlBfN7.png)

The 'Shadow" Shot

[url](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0CAcQjRxqFQoTCITWwdrZsccCFUHQgAodm1sA6Q&url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.pegnsean.net%2F~railwayseries%2Fthomas.htm&ei=9KfSVYSMNsGggwSbt4HIDg&bvm=bv.99804247,d.eXY&psig=AFQjCNELsVSv7NLazMc50IwjWLjysB88-A&ust=1439955311030013)

[url](https://www.google.com/url?sa=i&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=images&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=0CAcQjRxqFQoTCMnuqvzZsccCFQGADQodNdIJ7w&url=http%3A%2F%2Fshappeybunny.tumblr.com%2Fpost%2F110709592114%2Ffinnemore-february-sketch-of-the-day-thomas-the&ei=O6jSVYnlMYGANrWkp_gO&bvm=bv.99804247,d.eXY&psig=AFQjCNFoR6L0Nkgsqjtf1bUJNbAQ-PIMOQ&ust=1439955380811182)

you guys can post your trains too!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-18T03:36:53Z" title="08/18/2015 03:36  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 18, 2015</time> by Spacetraindriver**

A very unique build man, I look forward to seeing what else you come up with.

MJ

Dont forget to put the "cab" in the tender if shes going to fly ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
